CustomField.description: Copy of Created By used for Related Lists and Reports
CustomField.formula:
CreatedBy.FirstName&" "&CreatedBy.LastName&", "&
TEXT( MONTH( DATEVALUE( CreatedDate)) ) & "/" & TEXT( DAY(DATEVALUE( CreatedDate) ) ) & "/" & TEXT( YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Copy of Created By used for Related Lists and Reports
CustomField.label: Created by
